text: Smoky is a 1966 American western movie directed by George Sherman. It is the third adaptation of the 1926 novel Smoky the Cowhorse by Will James. It stars Fess Parker, Diana Hyland, Hoyt Axton, Katy Jurado, Roy Jenson, Chuck Robertson, Robert J. Wilke and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1966 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Sherman Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about horses
title: Smoky (1966 movie)
